mapper.sql:
where 1=1
and wms_in_out_tactics_.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.id},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.tactics_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.tacticsName},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.tactics_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.tacticsCode},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.user_defined1 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined1},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.user_defined2 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined2},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.user_defined3 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined3},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.user_defined4 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined4},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.user_defined5 LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.userDefined5},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.create_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.createBy},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.gmt_create LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtCreate},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.last_modified_by LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.lastModifiedBy},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.gmt_modified LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.gmtModified},'%')
and wms_in_out_tactics_.active_flag LIKE CONCAT('%',#{entity.activeFlag},'%')
mapper.insert: insert into wms_in_out_tactics ( tactics_name, tactics_code, user_defined1, user_defined2, user_defined3, user_defined4, user_defined5, create_by, gmt_create, last_modified_by, gmt_modified, active_flag) values ( #{tacticsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tacticsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDefined1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDefined2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDefined3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDefined4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userDefined5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activeFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into wms_in_out_tactics
id,
tactics_name,
tactics_code,
user_defined1,
user_defined2,
user_defined3,
user_defined4,
user_defined5,
create_by,
gmt_create,
last_modified_by,
gmt_modified,
active_flag,

#{tacticsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{userDefined1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
